name: The Last Settlement (TheProperGlitch)
description: In this game, you have a simple goal: to survive. As the leader of this small new town, it is your job to: make sure the people are happy, use your prophetic powers to check for danger, pray to the holy lord {REDACTED], and expand your town, in terms of people and land. This may seem easy enough, but you start to discover that not all is right. Welcome to The Last Settlement, a game that takes place in a desert in eastern Aaudi Srabia, a land that is not very welcoming to foreigners. You must manage resources and people to survive for as long as you can. The game is still in progress, so feel free to leave suggestions in the comments below.
